title: Google\Cloud\Functions\V2\PBFunction
name: PBFunction
description:
Describes a Cloud Function that contains user computation executed in response to an event. It encapsulates function and trigger configurations.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.functions.v2.Function

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: A user-defined name of the function. Function names must be unique globally and match pattern projects/*/locations/*/functions/*

params.name: data.environment
params.description: Describe whether the function is gen1 or gen2.

params.name: data.description
params.description: User-provided description of a function.

params.name: data.build_config
params.description: Describes the Build step of the function that builds a container from the given source.

params.name: data.service_config
params.description: Describes the Service being deployed. Currently deploys services to Cloud Run (fully managed).

params.name: data.event_trigger
params.description: An Eventarc trigger managed by Google Cloud Functions that fires events in response to a condition in another service.

params.name: data.state
params.description: Output only. State of the function.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. The last update timestamp of a Cloud Function.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: Labels associated with this Cloud Function.

params.name: data.state_messages
params.description: Output only. State Messages for this Cloud Function.
